cobblemon.species.xiaoxin.name: Xiaoxin
cobblemon.species.xiaoxin-mega.name: Mega Xiaoxin
cobblemon.move.actionbeam.desc: Fires a beam filled with Action Hero power to attack the enemy. Raises the user's Special Attack after use.
cobblemon.move.shakingbutt.desc: Attacks the enemy with cute wiggling buttocks. Always strikes first with high priority.
cobblemon.species.xiaoxin.desc: Nohara Shinnosuke, a 5-year-old kindergarten boy who loves Action Hero and often does hilarious things.
item.cobblemonextra.action_hero_mask.too: Xiaoxin's exclusive item. Increases the power of all moves by 50% when held.
item.cobblemonextra.xiaoxinite.tooltip: A miraculous stone that allows Xiaoxin to Mega Evolve.
